description: Runtime smoke gate override allowlist. Entries allow specific endpoints to return non-200 status codes without failing the deploy. All entries must have an expiry date and will be rejected if expired. See schema for policy rules.

policy_notes.expiry_interpretation: Expiry dates are interpreted as UTC. The check compares TODAY >= expiry_date to determine if expired.
policy_notes.status_503: Service Unavailable - standard allowlist rules, no special restrictions
policy_notes.status_500: Internal Server Error - STRICT POLICY: (1) reason MUST contain 'KNOWN_BUG_TEMPORARY', (2) expiry_date MUST be within 48 hours, (3) incident_doc REQUIRED pointing to docs/evidence/INC-*.md
